reviewHighlights.text: My gambling addict friend said if I post a review and it gets 150 likes and 50 Awards that he will buy me a case of beer, some vodka and 1 kg of lemon...
This is the peak of the formula. It refines the combat to a razor's edge. The weapons feel chunkier, the soundtrack slaps harder, and the visual feedb...
